description.plain:
One of South Korea’s most accomplished R&B singers, Dong Young Bae, better known by his stage name Taeyang, or Sol, is a singer-songwriter under YG Entertainment.

The singer first appeared on Jinusean’s music video for “A-YO”, followed by his debut under YG in 2006 as the main vocalist and main dancer of boy band BIGBANG.

In 2008, he became the first member to debut as a solo artist with his EP HOT, followed by the release of his first full-length album Solar in July of 2010; this album was released with an accompanying International Version, with the English versions of some of the tracks.

In 2013, Taeyang released the chart-topping single Ringa Linga, followed by the release of his second studio album, Rise,  which upon release he embarked on his first solo world tour. Eyes, Nose, Lips, one of the title tracks for the album, went on to win Song of the Year and Best Vocal Performance – Male at the 2014 Mnet Asian Music Awards (MAMA).

In an interview with Dazed, Taeyang explained the reason behind his name as:

…I am inspired a lot by the beauties of nature. I named myself as the sun because the sun is the brightest star from the incalculable stars in the universe.

TAEYANG discharged from his military service in 2019, after serving for 21 months. In 2020 TAEYANG released a documentary about his life as a musician and an idol.

body.plain:
One of South Korea’s most accomplished R&B singers, Dong Young Bae, better known by his stage name Taeyang, or Sol, is a singer-songwriter under YG Entertainment.

The singer first appeared on Jinusean’s music video for “A-YO”, followed by his debut under YG in 2006 as the main vocalist and main dancer of boy band BIGBANG.

In 2008, he became the first member to debut as a solo artist with his EP HOT, followed by the release of his first full-length album Solar in July of 2010; this album was released with an accompanying International Version, with the English versions of some of the tracks.

In 2013, Taeyang released the chart-topping single Ringa Linga, followed by the release of his second studio album, Rise,  which upon release he embarked on his first solo world tour. Eyes, Nose, Lips, one of the title tracks for the album, went on to win Song of the Year and Best Vocal Performance – Male at the 2014 Mnet Asian Music Awards (MAMA).

In an interview with Dazed, Taeyang explained the reason behind his name as:

…I am inspired a lot by the beauties of nature. I named myself as the sun because the sun is the brightest star from the incalculable stars in the universe.

TAEYANG discharged from his military service in 2019, after serving for 21 months. In 2020 TAEYANG released a documentary about his life as a musician and an idol.

songs.full_title: 눈, 코, 입 (EYES, NOSE, LIPS) by TAEYANG (태양)
songs.title: 눈, 코, 입 (EYES, NOSE, LIPS)

description.plain:
Second single from the second studio album of BIGBANG member TAEYANG, As part of its ‘Cover Project’, YG Family artists Akdong Musician, Tablo, Lydia Paek, Ikon AND Eric Nam have recorded other versions of the song.

Speaking to Complex, he stated:

The company held it back. [Laughs.] But the fans know. The album was prepared back then, and starting with “Ringa Linga” we wanted to put out records one after the other, and then release the album. I don’t think the company was certain about my album. The company asked me to work on more records, and because I wanted to put out this album so much, I concentrated on making more tracks. That’s how the single “Eyes, Nose, Lips” came about.

Speaking to Complex, he stated:

The company held it back. [Laughs.] But the fans know. The album was prepared back then, and starting with “Ringa Linga” we wanted to put out records one after the other, and then release the album. I don’t think the company was certain about my album. The company asked me to work on more records, and because I wanted to put out this album so much, I concentrated on making more tracks. That’s how the single “Eyes, Nose, Lips” came about.

songs.title: WEDDING DRESS (English version)

songs.lyrics:
8 ContributorsWEDDING DRESS (English version) Lyrics[Intro]
Some say it ain't over till it's over
But I guess it's really over now
There's something I gotta say before I let you go
Listen...

[Verse 1]
Can't believe what's goin' on
Gotta keep my cool, be calm
When I heard you and he was screamin' out of control
All I can think about is "No, no, no... he won't
Hurt the one I've cared for so long, long... Hell, no."
I know we're done, and now it's none of my concern but how
Can two be windin' out from only weeks in goin' out
Just makes me feel that what we had was real
Could it be or is it too late? (Oh, oh baby)

[Chorus]
Baby!
Listen to your heart, won't let you down
Cause you should be my Lady!
Now that we're apart love will show how
Life carries on...
I've never felt so strong
Life can lead us to a happiness never ending
If we just know that we belong to each other
Never worry, grow as we go
You might also like[Post-Chorus]
See you in your wedding dress
I can see you in your wedding dress
I see you walking down in your ... (wedding dress)
I can see you in your wedding dress (Oh, yea~)

[Verse 2]
I was never perfect no
But I'd never let it go to a point I'm ragin', throwin' making you uncomfortable
What he didn't, did to you was unacceptable
You claimed everything was okay. That's impossible
Just know I'm here for you
All clear for you from night to sun
God, I've been near to you, the feel of you gives me a rush
It makes me feel that what we have is real
It could never be too late oh yeah yeah

[Chorus]
Baby!
Listen to your heart, won't let you down
Cause you should be my Lady!
Now that we're apart love will show how
Life carries on...
I've never felt so strong
Life can lead us to a happiness never ending
If we just know that we belong to each other
Never worry, grow as we go
[Post-Chorus]
See you in your wedding dress
I can see you in your wedding dress
I see you walking down in your ... (wedding dress)
I can see you in your wedding dress (Oh, yea~)

[Bridge]
Baby girl you won't regret
Come along just take my hand
Let's start this journey livin' life so beautiful
This happy hope that we spread, love and see
It goes deeper so deep from my heart (Whoa oh oh oh oh)

[Chorus]
I've never felt so strong
Life can lead us to a happiness never ending
If we just know that we belong to each other
Never worry, grow as we go
See you in your wedding dress
I can see you in your wedding dress
Never let go... never let go
Oh yeah2Embed

songs.title: VIBE

description.plain:
“VIBE” marks South Korean singer-songwriter, TAEYANG’s return as a solo artist for the first time since 2018. The R&B-pop song is a collaboration with Jimin of BTS.

The accompanying music video for the song features sleek choreography performed by the two artists, who are both known for their dancing skills.

The song is TAEYANG’s first release after leaving his company YG Entertainment and joining its associate company, THEBLACKLABEL.
